name: Paul Villella
text: Always ask about deals!, Often if you're ordering and they have a pizza made and not picked up, you can get 1/3 off the orphan as your second pizza.  Tuesday 10$ is a steal! Get the most out of ANY large ( I like pan) YES you can grill a pizza, but be very cautious, it's easy to burn one and still have the center doughy.

name: Rae Frich
text: Yay pizza

name: Jess Meyer
text:
Open again! Thank goodness.

My wife picked up a couple pizzas and was impressed by the friendly service and expert advice. We will be back soon, thank you!

name: Alissa Wheeler
text: The young man who took our order this evening was trying to make jokes but came off extremely condescending and rude. We got a gift card and were told that if it doesn't work, we should bring it back. The gift card is going to someone...how ‚Ä¶More

name: Sandra McAnany
text: excellent fast service. Business has safety in mind for covid and displays distancing guidelines.

name: Mark Pothen
text: So glad to see this is open again. I'll be up there this Thurs to get pizza and watch the NFL draft!

name: Laura Bruihler
text:
Unfortunately this location is now closed.
I used to drive further to this location because of the friendly staff and more pizza for your money. Sad it closed so suddenly.

name: Elizabeth Swenson
text: I ordered 5 pizzas and had my baby boy with me. They loaded my pizzas into my car for me! It was so, so nice. Also, this location has $11 family size pizzas on Tuesday ($10 for large). Love!

name: Karen Schneider
text: Always fast and friendly service.  The pizza is perfect every time, great salads too.  The facility is super clean and the manager is nearly always there.  I usually order online and there‚Äôs no waiting to pick up my order.

name: Carmon Juneau
text: The location is now closed as of 9/2/2919. I went to get pizza and found the closed sign. Always had good luck here good food and service.

name: Garcia Family
text: I go out of my way to go to this location. Our nearest location has poor service and poor quality pizzas. We always drive to this one and enjoy it every time! Dum dums for the children and hometown feel for a chain. Enjoy!

name: Kate Polini
text: This pizza is the best! I've had it several times from here as well as salads and I'll be back. They have other sandwiches and side so I'll have to check them out.

name: Good Skooma Pipe
text: very professional and enthusiastic crew with a lot of knowledge of their products. very impressive, keep up the good work

name: Sara Stowe
text: Friendly staff. Clean. Fast. Specialty of the day pizzas are a nice option. They always let me know when taco or cheeseburger pizzas are coming up. My home is about halfway between this location and the one in Arden hills; I will go out of my way to go to this one first.

name: Andy Riehm
text: I don't get the whole take and bake concept, if I order a pizza and go pick it up, I'm doing it because I don't want to have to cook it. My folks love it though and feel like they are saving a few bucks so we get it from time to time. I ‚Ä¶More

name: Holly Lemke
text: Fast friendly service and fantastic food!!

name: Kenny Judge II
text: Papa Murphys take and bake pizza company is one of the best places to stop by for a meal that will bring the whole family joy. I love this business not only for the wonderful food but also for their involvement in the communities they feed ‚Ä¶More

name: Tina Judkins
text: Great staff, good food, nice environment, friendly people, nice that u can pick up your food and bake it at home for a reasonable price... they not only have pizza they also have dessert, salads and more.

name: Kim Beauregard
text: Order a pumpkin pizza really fun good to eat u do have to take home to cook wish they had one closer to me staff was fun they were busy little wait but told me welcome and be with me soon fun atmosphere staff looking like they were having fun

name: Mike Stevenson
text: The restaurant is big and clean looking.  But there are no parking space.

name: Michael Geimer
text: Great service very helpful and of course the pizza is really delicious

name: Hanno Linda
text: This site's work ethic is unbeatable.  I was just at a site that wouldn't open when there were 2 customers waiting and it was just minutes to 11 am.  That would never happen here.  They are courteous, friendly, and more than willing to make the pizza just the way you want it. Take note management from other sites...

name: Justin Dritz
text: Best Papa Murphy‚Äôs in the area, been coming here for years and even if another is closer on way home will detour for these guys.
